# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found) 

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of 
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) 
- Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of 
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities with no fuel
- Ensure that the burner entities have fuel before using them
- Burner mining drills and burners inserters are currently without fuel

### Errors when using entities that are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that the entities are connected to the electric network before using them
- The steam engine is currently not connected to the electric network

### Errors when using entities with no ingredients
- Ensure that the entities have the necessary ingredients before using them
- The stone furnace at position (x=60.0 y=-60.0) is currently without ingredients

### Errors when using pipe groups that are empty
- Ensure that the pipe groups are not empty before using them
- The pipe group at position (x=107.5 y=-34.5) is currently empty

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned by the agent.
